Package roadroller.gameobject

Interface Summary
Enemy Use this interface for scoreable objects.
GameObject GameObject represents objects in the game
 

Class Summary
Ball A red Ball jumping across the street
BloodSplatter A simple animated BloodSplatter effect.
Car Class representing the Car object
Granny A Granny walking around on the street.
PlayerObject player class - represents the steamroller
SpriteObject A object using a Sprite used to construct any visible gameobjects except the background.
